item.description:
Dinner & The Guitar Guys

TONIGHT!  04/11/2013, 8:30 PM - 11:30 PM 
Whippersnappers Restaurant Address: 44 Nashua Rd Londonderry, NH info@whippersnappersnh.com The Guitar Guys Jon Finn & Dave Shaheen

http://www.nh.com/nh/events/nightlife/49119/the-guitar-guys-jon-finn-dave-shaheen

Host: Steve Ob1.   603-491-1962  ob@tds.net     Event posted with 8 other Meetup Groups.

Please join Steve Ob1. for an evening of meeting some new people, food, drink & some fine acoustics music. This is their mid week guitar jam with our favorite "Guitar Guys" Jon and Dave. I plan to be there for dinner at 7 pm.. The music starts around 8:30ish.. If you can't make it for dinner? Please join us at anytime. But, even if you don't want anything to eat with us? If you could come early to help us hold seats? That would really help.  Otherwise, we will see you there.

Look for the Meetup signs on our tables.
item.how_to_find_us: Look 4 the Meetup signs on our tables
item.name: Dinner & The Guitar Guys Tonight!
